#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int p[1000001];
    while(t>0)
    {
        t--;
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        int a,b;
        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)p[i] = i;
        for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            cin>>a>>b;
            p[b]--;
            p[a]++;
        }
        int flag = -1;
        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(p[i] == n)
            {
                flag = i;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==-1)
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else
            cout<<2<<" "<<flag<<endl;
        
    }
    return 0;
}
